sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>buddy</radical> <radical>building</radical> is in the next <kanji>county</kanji>. If it was in your county then it wouldn't be a buddy, it would be a neighbor. You're aware of this building, but they aren't that close, so they're just a buddy.
meaningInfo: Imagine looking at a map of your county and the surrounding ones. All of the buildings in the counties next to yours are buddy buildings!
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>county</kanji> is everything you can reach when shooting a <reading>gun</reading> (<ja>ぐん</ja>). If the bullet can't reach a building you know, it's a buddy building in another county.
readingInfo: Imagine taking out a gun and shooting in a random direction. When you find where the bullet landed, you know that's the county line. Though if it gets stuck in a building or a person it doesn't count. You'll have to try again.
